title: Electric Sweeper Truck DTMS – 3000 EV

specifications.label: Safety Features
specifications.value: Alarm, Front & Rear Warning Lights, Radar Safety System

description: The Dynaclean DTMS-3000 Electric Sweeper Truck is capable of seamlessly integrating into smart city operations. Sweeper Truck machine is environmentally innovative, designed for optimal performance when cleaning urban areas or industry settings.Being a battery-powered Sweeper Truck, it does not emit harmful gases. This feature makes the device highly suitable for use in places such as industrial parks, airports, and cities where environmental concerns are a primary focus.
keyFeatures: High-Capacity Water & Dust Tanks – 900L water and 3000L dust collection for extended operation.
Spacious & Comfortable Cabin – Accommodates two operators for efficient cleaning management.
Zero Emissions & Eco-Friendly – Reduces air pollution with a fully electric operation.
Anti-Smog Water Spray System – Controls dust and improves air quality during sweeping.
In-Built Jet Pressure Washer (130 Bar) – Multi-purpose use for deep cleaning roads, sidewalks, and public spaces.
Plant Washing System – Cleans roadside plants and keeps the environment green.
Long Battery Life – Provides up to 10 hours of continuous operation on a full charge.
Ergonomic & User-Friendly Design – Easy-to-use controls for effortless operation.
Large Sweeping Width (2500 mm) – Ensures faster and more effective cleaning in less time.
